meanings.definition: A substance or device used to make something softer.
meanings.sent1: I added a softener to the laundry to make my clothes feel cozy.
meanings.sent2: The fabric softener made the towels fluffy and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The softener in the dryer seemed to work like magic, turning rough towels into gentle clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted as a softener, easing the tension in the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The softener whispered to the fabric, transforming it into a gentle embrace.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that softens.
meanings.sent1: The mother's gentle touch was a natural softener for her child's worries.
meanings.sent2: The softener of hearts, he always knew the right words to comfort others.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy puppy was the ultimate softener, melting even the toughest of hearts.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a softener, smoothing out the rough edges of the situation.
meanings.sent5: His presence was like a softener, calming the room with his soothing aura.
